posts.raw_content:
Acts 3, 22 "For Moses said, ‘The Lord your God will raise up for you a prophet like me from among your own people; you must listen to everything he tells you." 23 "***Anyone*** who does not listen to him will be completely cut off from their people" - no exceptions for Jews

Acts 4 12 "Salvation is found in no one else (Jesus), for there is no other name under heaven given to mankind by which we must be saved"

Acts 10 28 "He said to them: “You are well aware that it is against our law for a Jews to associate with or visit a Gentile. But God has shown me that I should not call anyone impure or unclean" - God said a tenet of the jewish supremacist ideology was wrong.

Acts 12 11 "Then Peter came to himself and said, “Now I know without a doubt that the Lord has sent his angel and rescued me from Herod’s clutches and from everything the Jews people were hoping would happen" - Bad jews and good jews were completely opposed to each other. They did not put race first, but character.

Acts 13 10 "You are a child of the devil and an enemy of everything that is right!" - Saul calls a jew a child of the devil when he does evil

Acts 13 44 "On the next Sabbath almost the whole city gathered to hear the word of the Lord. 45 When the Jes saw the crowds, they were filled with jealousy. They began to contradict what Paul was saying and heaped abuse on him."

Acts 13 46 "Since you (Jews) reject it (the Gospel) and **do not consider yourselves worthy of eternal life"**

Acts 15 9 "He did not discriminate between us and them, for he purified their hearts by faith" - Jew and Gentile alike are equal if they have Christ

Revelation 3 9 "I will make those who are of the synagogue of Satan, who claim to be Jews though they are not, but are liars—I will make them come and fall down at your feet and acknowledge that I have loved you."

--------

Feel free to read the context yourself. Basically the entire book of Acts covers this foundational point. It's basically the entire basis of what Christianity is. Salvation is through Jesus Christ. Christians are God's Church and His body. "Israel" can be used literally, or metaphorically. God clearly describes that Jews and Gentile alike are saved through the Christ, and that Jews that reject Christ are damned. 

Is Bibi Christian? Does the IDF spread the Gospel when the bomb residential areas? Do Jews in Israel ever spit on Christians? Is **Israel in West Virginia** blessed? If Virginia wanted to start another civil war in America must we support it because it has "Israel" in it? Is a 1940's EU creation that they named Israel the same as the one 2000 years ago? Or the one named in Genesis? Is Springfield Armory today the same one that armed our troops in history, or was it just a Trademark that the M1a manufacturing company gained? 

You guys get the point? There is no duty to support a modern nation's wars, no matter what it is called. You don't owe anything to "Jews." Evil Jews go to hell. Jews that follow Christ are your brothers and sisters, like any other race, and go to heaven with you. Jews like Ovadia Yosef that claim all non-Jews are their slave cattle only fit to serve them while they sit at the table and eat got 800k ppl to his Jerusalem funeral, are still burning in hell. 

The point is, don't let anyone misquote the Bible or lie to you about religion, or capitalize on your ignorance, to make you fund their bloodwars.
